commands: runuser -l ec2-user -c 'export SKIP_VALIDATION=True FP_TAG=1.0.3 DS_TAG=1.0.2 NGIAB_TAG=1.5.0 && /home/ec2-user/ngen-datastream/scripts/datastream -s DAILY -n 3 -F s3://ciroh-community-ngen-datastream/v2.2/ngen.DAILY/forcing_short_range/00/ngen.t00z.short_range.forcing.f001_f018.VPU_01.nc --FORCING_SOURCE NWM_V3_SHORT_RANGE_00 -d /home/ec2-user/outputs -r s3://ciroh-community-ngen-datastream/v2.2_resources/VPU_01 -R https://ciroh-community-ngen-datastream.s3.amazonaws.com/realizations/realization_VPU_01.json --S3_BUCKET ciroh-community-ngen-datastream --S3_PREFIX tests/orca_test'
